    SourceSelector, Component
    Deprecated. 
    Instead of subclassing DefaultSourceSelectionController, please create your customized SourceSelector and use it to construct the DefaultSourceSelectionController with DefaultSourceSelectionController.createWithSourceSelector(EventEmitter, SourceSelector)

public class ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController
extends DefaultSourceSelectionController

        @NonNull
public Source selectSource(@NonNull
                                    Video video)
                             throws NoSourceFoundException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: SourceSelector
        Determines best appropriate Source within given Video object based on logic implemented.
        Specified by:
        selectSource in interface SourceSelector
